verses.text: After Ehud \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w forces|strong="H6635"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Harosheth-hagoyim|strong="H2800"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* Jabin \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* harshly \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6256"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, \w the|strong="H8199"\w* wife \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w Lappidoth|strong="H3941"\w*, \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Palm|strong="H8560"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w between|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abinoam \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Surely|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanding|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*: ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w march|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w troops|strong="H6635"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w River|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.’”

\w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w her|strong="H1980"\w*, “If \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* if \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* replied, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w taking|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w honor|strong="H8597"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w selling|strong="H4376"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman.” \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*,

where \w he|strong="H7272"\w* \w summoned|strong="H2199"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*. \w Ten|strong="H6235"\w* thousand men \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w also|strong="H1683"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

Now \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* moved \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*, \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hobab|strong="H2246"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \f + \fr 4:11 \ft Or brother-in-law\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* tent \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* great tree \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zaanannim|strong="H6815"\w*, which \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w near|strong="H5704"\w* \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abinoam \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*,

\w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w summoned|strong="H2199"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w Harosheth-hagoyim|strong="H2800"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w River|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w*, “\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* thousand men following \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w routed|strong="H2000"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w charioteers|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*. \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* abandoned \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Harosheth-hagoyim|strong="H2800"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w*. Jael Kills Sisera

Meanwhile, \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* tent \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wife \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H7965"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w between|strong="H7965"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*.

\w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* greet \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w*, \w my|strong="H3318"\w* lord. \w Come|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w entered|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* tent, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* she \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blanket.

Sisera said \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w her|strong="H3680"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* container \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, \w gave|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H8248"\w* again.

“\w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tent,” \w he|strong="H3426"\w* said, “\w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* anyone \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w asks|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H7592"\w*, ‘\w Is|strong="H3426"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w here|strong="H6311"\w*?’ say, ‘\w No|strong="H5975"\w*.’”

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w sleeping|strong="H7290"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* exhaustion, \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w*’s wife \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H3489"\w* \w peg|strong="H3489"\w*, grabbed \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hammer|strong="H4718"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w went|strong="H3027"\w* silently \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Sisera. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w drove|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w peg|strong="H3489"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w temple|strong="H7541"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w Barak|strong="H1301"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, \w Jael|strong="H3278"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* greet \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H7291"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w lay|strong="H5307"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H3489"\w* \w peg|strong="H3489"\w* \w through|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w temple|strong="H7541"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* God \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w grew|strong="H1980"\w* stronger \w and|strong="H1121"\w* stronger \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
